original_text: Then he threw the dragon into the deep hole. He closed the door to the deep hole, and he locked it with the key. He put a seal on the door. During that time, Satan could no longer deceive the people of all nations. But after the 1,000 years have finished, he must go free for a short time.
korean_text: 무저갱에 던져 넣어 잠그고 그 위에 인봉하여 천 년이 차도록 다시는 만국을 미혹하지 못하게 하였는데 그 후에는 반드시 잠깐 놓이리라

sentences.original_text: Then he threw the dragon into the deep hole.
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 그는 용을 깊은 구덩이에 던져 넣었습니다.

sentences.original_text: He closed the door to the deep hole,
and he locked it with the key.
He put a seal on the door.
Satan could no longer deceive the people of all nations.
sentences.korean_translation: 사탄은 더 이상 모든 나라의 사람들을 속일 수 없었습니다.

sentences.original_text: But after the 1,000 years have finished,
he must go free for a short time.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 짧은 시간 동안 자유로워야 합니다.
